thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 81 of 494
thread.title: Glenn Kuehn

author: Glenn Kuehn
title: Glenn Kuehn
text: While I still have reservations as the products which I ordered have not been received, I was impressed with the simplicity of the ordering process. The items ordered are for a significant other whom lives in a different state which I hope to be able to get there by Valentines day. I also do not recall any return/exchange policy if I should have ordered wrong sizes. Thank you for an overall good experience thus far.
